Job Position: Public Relations Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are seeking a skilled and resourceful Public Relations Specialist to join our growing team.
	The ideal candidate will play a key role in enhancing our brand image and driving visibility through strategic public relations efforts, with a strong emphasis on leveraging relationships with brand influencers and key opinion leaders (KOLs).


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute public relations strategies to promote the company&rsquo;s brand and image.
	Identify, engage, and manage relationships with brand influencers, celebrities, and media personalities to support brand campaigns and promotions.
	Coordinate media outreach, press releases, and public statements.
	Monitor media coverage, public perception, and industry trends to provide strategic recommendations.
	Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to ensure consistent and aligned messaging.
	Support the planning and execution of media events, product launches, and influencer activations.


Requirements


	Minimum qualification: OND in Public Relations, Mass Communication, Marketing, or a related field.
	1 - 3 years of relevant experience in public relations, media, or communications.
	Demonstrated network of brand influencers or access to key opinion leaders.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Strong interpersonal and relationship-building abilities.
	Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.


Method of Application

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Logistic Officer",
  "description": "ETC Workforce Services Limited -&nbsp;Our client is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Logistic Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos (Remote)
Work type:&nbsp;Hybrid

Job Summary


	We are seeking a proactive Logistics Officer to expand our fleet by sourcing additional trucks and drivers while managing day-to-day logistics operations to ensure efficient and timely delivery of goods and services.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and engage truck owners and drivers to grow the company&rsquo;s fleet.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with transport partners and vendors.
	Coordinate onboarding, documentation, and compliance checks for new trucks and drivers.
	Monitor fleet availability and ensure adequate trucks are scheduled for operations.
	Plan, coordinate, and track shipment of goods and materials.
	Ensure timely delivery and resolve any operational or delivery challenges.
	Maintain accurate records of logistics activities, truck movements, and driver schedules.
	Ensure all logistics processes comply with health, safety, and regulatory requirements.
	Prepare and submit regular reports on fleet status, logistics costs, and operational performance.
	Assist in route planning and optimization to reduce delivery time and fuel costs.
	Collaborate with warehouse, procurement, and operations teams to align logistics activities with overall company goals.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND/HND/Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Logistics, Transport Management, Supply Chain, or a related field.
	Proven experience in fleet management and general logistics operations.
	Strong negotiation, coordination, and relationship management skills.
	Good knowledge of local transport regulations and documentation.
